Name: helicopter 2.0
About the game: A game about a helicopter plowing through the open spaces, the land scorched by the sun. With addictive gameplay and auto-generated levels, the goal of the game is to fly as much as possible. And get the maximum number of points, accompanied by gorgeous music, in the spirit of the best shooters. Enjoy the breathtaking game play.
